Each one Katie considered her cute friend, there was something about the tiny women that fascinated Katie and made her feel warm and fuzzy inside.

As much as Katie liked her friends and dolls, she felt she was missing something deeper in her life. She was soon going to find out what that was.

On an average Friday at school, Katie was enjoying recess after lunch playing tag with her friends, as they finished the game the young girl saw her shoe was untied. She bent down to tie her shoe when she spotted something moving in the grass.

“Huh? What’s that?” She peered down towards the grass and saw a tiny person trying to run. “Oh my gosh! A human doll!”

A six inch nude version of one of her classmates was not one of them.
